name: Kinzo: God's Mistake
description:
Kinzo's one true love has been taken away from him by none other than God. Follow him on his rampant quest to slay Him in this one of a kind Shoot Em' Up. 

Made by Mega Bite, The Game Assembly, Stockholm.

The game features:

  • Three unique levels, telling the story of Kinzo.
  • Paw-licking good action.
  • An original soundtrack.
